statements: SELECT * FROM EventAttendees WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT attendee_id, interests FROM EventAttendees WHERE engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM EventAttendees WHERE interests LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT event_id, engagement_level FROM EventAttendees WHERE attendee_id = 3;
SELECT attendee_id, interests, engagement_level FROM EventAttendees WHERE interests IS NOT NULL;
SELECT attendee_id, event_id, interests, engagement_level FROM EventAttendees;
SELECT interests, engagement_level, attendee_id, event_id FROM EventAttendees WHERE engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM EventAttendees WHERE interests LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT attendee_id, event_id, engagement_level, interests FROM EventAttendees ORDER BY engagement_level ASC;
SELECT attendee_id, event_id, interests, engagement_level FROM EventAttendees WHERE interests = 'music' AND engagement_level = 'Medium';
SELECT * FROM segment_event_attendees WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT attendee_id, interest FROM segment_event_attendees WHERE interest='Music';
SELECT campaign_name, target_engagement_level FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_interest='Technology';
SELECT * FROM segment_event_attendees ORDER BY attendee_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(engagement_level) FROM segment_event_attendees;
SELECT * FROM segment_event_attendees WHERE interest = 'Music' ORDER BY engagement_level DESC, attendee_id ASC;
SELECT attendee_id, interest FROM segment_event_attendees WHERE event_id = 1001 GROUP BY interest HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT campaign_name, target_interest, target_engagement_level FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_engagement_level > 3 ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT attendee_id, event_id, interest, engagement_level FROM segment_event_attendees WHERE interest LIKE '%Tech%' OR interest LIKE '%Gaming%' ORDER BY event_id ASC, engagement_level DESC;

SELECT * FROM segment_event_attendees JOIN marketing_campaigns ON segment_event_attendees.interest = marketing_campaigns.target_interest WHERE segment_event_attendees.interest = marketing_campaigns.target_interest ORDER BY segment_event_attendees.attendee_id ASC, marketing_campaigns.campaign_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM interest_segments;
SELECT attendee_id, interest_category FROM interest_segments;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM attendee_profile ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_interest, target_engagement_level FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_content FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM interest_segments WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM attendee_profile WHERE interest_category = 'Technology';
SELECT campaign_name, target_interest, campaign_content FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM interest_segments JOIN attendee_profile ON interest_segments.attendee_id = attendee_profile.attendee_id;
SELECT campaign_name, target_interest, target_engagement_level, campaign_content FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM EventAttendees;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM EventAttendees ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, first_name, email, interest_level FROM EventAttendees WHERE interest_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM EventAttendees WHERE engagement_level < 2;
SELECT e.*, i.interest_name FROM EventAttendees e JOIN UserInterests ui ON e.user_id = ui.user_id JOIN Interests i ON ui.interest_id = i.interest_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM EventAttendees WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM EventAttendees WHERE interest_level > 3 AND engagement_level < 2;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, i.interest_name FROM EventAttendees e INNER JOIN UserInterests u ON e.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN Interests i ON u.interest_id = i.interest_id;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, c.campaign_name, c.start_date, c.end_date FROM EventAttendees e INNER JOIN Campaigns c ON e.interest_level = c.campaign_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendees, AVG(interest_level) AS avg_interest_level FROM EventAttendees;
SELECT * FROM attendees;
SELECT name, email FROM attendees WHERE interest = 'Technology';
SELECT attendee_id, event_name, event_date FROM event_attendance WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(result_id) AS total_results FROM marketing_campaigns JOIN campaign_results ON marketing_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_results.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT name, email FROM attendees WHERE interest = 'Tech' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT attendee_id, event_name, event_date FROM event_attendance WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_results WHERE mail_opened = TRUE AND link_clicked = TRUE;
SELECT interest_name FROM interests ORDER BY interest_name ASC;
